txt.en: The Black Númenórean sorcerers in Dol Guldur use a strange ash in their foul rituals.

'Deep within Dol Guldur, the Enemy has begun training some of their servants in dark crafts...we must put an end to it! 

'Enter into Sâd-en-Dagor and seek out the Black Númenórean sorcerers there. Some of these evil Men may bear the strange ash that they use in their foul rituals.

'Once you have collected the ash, return it here to me, and we will dispose of it. Follow the road north-east from Helethir to Sâd-en-Dagor within Dol Guldur.'
Sâd-en-Dagor is in Dol Guldur, north-east of Helethir.\n\nStirnir has asked you to enter Sâd-en-Dagor and recover the strange ash from the Black Númenórean sorcerers there.
'I hope you have handled this sparingly, [placeholder]. Who knows what foul spells and rites have been performed upon it....'
Stirnir is at Helethir, south-west of Dol Guldur.\n\nYou should return to Stirnir with the strange ash.
'We must find the purpose of this ash at once!'
'We must find the purpose of this ash at once!'
